document.full_text: lindsey vonn has been dominant in super-g this season, with four victories and two seconds, and was counting on the race to increase her lead over maria riesch in the race for the overall title.
document.title: vonn foiled in chance to pad lead
lines_and_colors: lindsey vonn has been dominant in super-g this season, with four victories and two seconds, and was counting on the race to increase her lead over maria riesch in the race for the overall title.
